column1: '''Yavannamírë''' was a [[Fragrant Trees|fragrant evergreen tree]] which had globed
column2: scarlet fruits. The [[Eldar]] of [[Tol Eressëa]] brought it among other trees as a gift from the West to the [[Númenóreans]]. In [[Númenor]] the tree thrived in [[Nísimaldar]] around the port of [[Eldalondë]]
column4: and was thus lost from the Mortal Lands at the [[Downfall of Númenor]]. In the songs
column6: it was still remembered after the Downfall like the other trees of the Nísimaldar: [[oiolairë]]

column1: The word ''yavannamírë'' means Jewel of [[Yavanna]] in [[Quenya]] (from ''Yavanna'' and ''[[mírë]]''= "jewel").{{fact}}
